description: The latest Material Symbols as React components rendering SVGs

scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run download && npm run generate
scripts.clean:svg: set -eu; for w in 200 300 400 500 600; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts delete svg --symbols --in svg/$w; done
scripts.download: npm run download:svg && npm run download:metadata
scripts.version: npm version -w svg/200 -w svg/300 -w svg/400 -w svg/500 -w svg/600
scripts.postversion: npm install && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./svg/package.json').version") npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.publish: npm publish -w svg/200 -w svg/300 -w svg/400 -w svg/500 -w svg/600
